message.en_US: Here in this Info Hub, ya can learn about some tricks you're going to need to know.

message.en_US: The door on your \c[3]left\c[0] goes to an area teaching you about \c[3]hitting high switches from lower elevation\c[0].

message.en_US: And the door on your \c[3]right\c[0] goes to an area teaching you about \c[3]glitchy box grabs\c[0].
